text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: tasyAM rajanyAM vyuSTAyAM dharmarAjo yudhiSThiraH
text.ur: tasyāṁ rajanyāṁ vyuṣṭāyāṁ dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

text.ascii: utthAyAvazyakAryANi kRtavAn bhratRbhiH saha
text.ur: utthāyāvaśyakāryāṇi kr̥tavān bhratr̥bhiḥ saha

text.ascii: tataH saMcodayAm Asa so 'rjunaM bhrAtRnandanam
text.ur: tataḥ saṁcodayām āsa so ’rjunaṁ bhrātr̥nandanam

text.ascii: darzayAstrANi kaunteya yair jitA dAnavAs tvayA
text.ur: darśayāstrāṇi kaunteya yair jitā dānavās tvayā

text.ascii: tato dhanaMjayo rAjan devair dattAni pANDavaH
text.ur: tato dhanaṁjayo rājan devair dattāni pāṇḍavaḥ

text.ascii: astrANi tAni divyAni darzayAm Asa bhArata
text.ur: astrāṇi tāni divyāni darśayām āsa bhārata

text.ascii: yathAnyAyaM mahAtejAH zaucaM paramam AsthitaH
text.ur: yathānyāyaṁ mahātejāḥ śaucaṁ paramam āsthitaḥ

text.ascii: girikUbaraM pAdapAGgaM zubhaveNu triveNukam
text.ur: girikūbaraṁ pādapāṅgaṁ śubhaveṇu triveṇukam

text.ascii: pArthivaM ratham AsthAya zobhamAno dhanaMjayaH
text.ur: pārthivaṁ ratham āsthāya śobhamāno dhanaṁjayaḥ

text.ascii: tataH sudaMzitas tena kavacena suvarcasA
text.ur: tataḥ sudaṁśitas tena kavacena suvarcasā

text.ascii: dhanur AdAya gANDIvaM devadattaM ca vArijam
text.ur: dhanur ādāya gāṇḍīvaṁ devadattaṁ ca vārijam

text.ascii: zozubhyamAnaH kaunteya AnupUrvyAn mahAbhujaH
text.ur: śośubhyamānaḥ kaunteya ānupūrvyān mahābhujaḥ

text.ascii: astrANi tAni divyAni darzanAyopacakrame
text.ur: astrāṇi tāni divyāni darśanāyopacakrame

text.ascii: atha prayokSyamANena divyAny astrANi tena vai
text.ur: atha prayokṣyamāṇena divyāny astrāṇi tena vai

text.ascii: samAkrAntA mahI padbhyAM samakampata sadrumA
text.ur: samākrāntā mahī padbhyāṁ samakampata sadrumā

text.ascii: kSubhitAH saritaz caiva tathaiva ca mahodadhiH
text.ur: kṣubhitāḥ saritaś caiva tathaiva ca mahodadhiḥ

text.ascii: zailAz cApi vyazIryanta na vavau ca samIraNaH
text.ud: शैलाश्चापि व्यशीर्यन्त न ववौ च समीरणः
text.ur: śailāś cāpi vyaśīryanta na vavau ca samīraṇaḥ

text.ascii: na babhAse sahasrAMzur na jajvAla ca pAvakaH
text.ud: न बभासे सहस्रांशुर्न जज्वाल च पावकः
text.ur: na babhāse sahasrāṁśur na jajvāla ca pāvakaḥ

text.ascii: na vedAH pratibhAnti sma dvijAtInAM kathaM cana
text.ud: न वेदाः प्रतिभान्ति स्म द्विजातीनां कथंचन
text.ur: na vedāḥ pratibhānti sma dvijātīnāṁ kathaṁ cana

text.ascii: antarbhUmigatA ye ca prANino janamejaya
text.ur: antarbhūmigatā ye ca prāṇino janamejaya

text.ascii: pIDyamAnAH samutthAya pANDavaM paryavArayan
text.ur: pīḍyamānāḥ samutthāya pāṇḍavaṁ paryavārayan

text.ascii: vepamAnAH prAJjalayas te sarve pihitAnanAH
text.ur: vepamānāḥ prāñjalayas te sarve pihitānanāḥ

text.ascii: dahyamAnAs tadAstrais tair yAcanti sma dhanaMjayam
text.ur: dahyamānās tadāstrais tair yācanti sma dhanaṁjayam

text.ascii: tato brahmarSayaz caiva siddhAz caiva surarSayaH
text.ur: tato brahmarṣayaś caiva siddhāś caiva surarṣayaḥ

text.ascii: jaGgamAni ca bhUtAni sarvANy evAvatasthire
text.ur: jaṅgamāni ca bhūtāni sarvāṇy evāvatasthire

text.ascii: rAjarSayaz ca pravarAs tathaiva ca divaukasaH
text.ur: rājarṣayaś ca pravarās tathaiva ca divaukasaḥ

text.ascii: yakSarAkSasagandharvAs tathaiva ca patatriNaH
text.ur: yakṣarākṣasagandharvās tathaiva ca patatriṇaḥ

text.ascii: tataH pitAmahaz caiva lokapAlAz ca sarvazaH
text.ur: tataḥ pitāmahaś caiva lokapālāś ca sarvaśaḥ

text.ascii: bhagavAMz ca mahAdevaH sagaNo 'bhyAyayau tadA
text.ur: bhagavāṁś ca mahādevaḥ sagaṇo ’bhyāyayau tadā

text.ascii: tato vAyur mahArAja divyair mAlyaiH sugandhibhiH
text.ur: tato vāyur mahārāja divyair mālyaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ

text.ascii: abhitaH pANDavAMz citrair avacakre samantataH
text.ur: abhitaḥ pāṇḍavāṁś citrair avacakre samantataḥ

text.ascii: jaguz ca gAthA vividhA gandharvAH suracoditAH
text.ur: jaguś ca gāthā vividhā gandharvāḥ suracoditāḥ

text.ascii: nanRtuH saMghazaz caiva rAjann apsarasAM gaNAH
text.ur: nanr̥tuḥ saṁghaśaś caiva rājann apsarasāṁ gaṇāḥ

text.ascii: tasmiMs tu tumule kAle nAradaH suracoditaH
text.ur: tasmiṁs tu tumule kāle nāradaḥ suracoditaḥ

text.ascii: AgamyAha vacaH pArthaM zravaNIyam idaM nRpa
text.ur: āgamyāha vacaḥ pārthaṁ śravaṇīyam idaṁ nr̥pa

text.ascii: arjunArjuna mA yuGkSva divyAny astrANi bhArata
text.ur: arjunārjuna mā yuṅkṣva divyāny astrāṇi bhārata

text.ascii: naitAni niradhiSThAne prayujyante kadA cana
text.ur: naitāni niradhiṣṭhāne prayujyante kadā cana

text.ascii: adhiSThAne na vAnArtaH prayuJjIta kadA cana
text.ur: adhiṣṭhāne na vānārtaḥ prayuñjīta kadā cana

text.ascii: prayoge sumahAn doSo hy astrANAM kurunandana
text.ur: prayoge sumahān doṣo hy astrāṇāṁ kurunandana

text.ascii: etAni rakSyamANAni dhanaMjaya yathAgamam
text.ur: etāni rakṣyamāṇāni dhanaṁjaya yathāgamam

text.ascii: balavanti sukhArhANi bhaviSyanti na saMzayaH
text.ur: balavanti sukhārhāṇi bhaviṣyanti na saṁśayaḥ

text.ascii: arakSyamANAny etAni trailokyasyApi pANDava
text.ur: arakṣyamāṇāny etāni trailokyasyāpi pāṇḍava

text.ascii: bhavanti sma vinAzAya maivaM bhUyaH kRthAH kva cit
text.ud: भवन्ति स्म विनाशाय मैवं भूयः कृथाः क्वचित्
text.ur: bhavanti sma vināśāya maivaṁ bhūyaḥ kr̥thāḥ kva cit

text.ascii: ajAtazatro tvaM caiva drakSyase tAni saMyuge
text.ud: अजातशत्रो त्वं चैव द्रक्ष्यसे तानि संयुगे
text.ur: ajātaśatro tvaṁ caiva drakṣyase tāni saṁyuge

text.ascii: yojyamAnAni pArthena dviSatAm avamardane
text.ur: yojyamānāni pārthena dviṣatām avamardane

text.ascii: nivAryAtha tataH pArthaM sarve devA yathAgatam
text.ud: निवार्याथ ततः पार्थं सर्वे देवा यथागतम्
text.ur: nivāryātha tataḥ pārthaṁ sarve devā yathāgatam

text.ascii: jagmur anye ca ye tatra samAjagmur nararSabha
text.ur: jagmur anye ca ye tatra samājagmur nararṣabha

text.ascii: teSu sarveSu kauravya pratiyAteSu pANDavAH
text.ur: teṣu sarveṣu kauravya pratiyāteṣu pāṇḍavāḥ

text.ascii: tasminn eva vane hRSTAs ta USuH saha kRSNayA
text.ud: तस्मिन्नेव वने हृष्टास्त ऊषुः सह कृष्णया
text.ur: tasminn eva vane hr̥ṣṭās ta ūṣuḥ saha kr̥ṣṇayā
